scripts.kill:app: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='SilentlyContinue'; taskkill /IM 'Flashcards Anywhere.exe' /F; taskkill /IM electron.exe /F; Get-Process | Where-Object { $_.ProcessName -match 'Flashcards|electron' -or $_.MainWindowTitle -match 'Flashcards Anywhere' } | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Get-CimInstance Win32_Process | Where-Object { $_.CommandLine -match 'flashcards-anywhere.*server\.js' -or $_.CommandLine -match 'server\.js' } | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_.ProcessId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 800; 1..3 | ForEach-Object { if (Test-Path 'dist/win-unpacked/resources/app.asar') { try { Remove-Item 'dist/win-unpacked/resources/app.asar' -Force } catch {}; Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 400 } }"
scripts.build:electron: npm run kill:app && powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; $out = Join-Path 'dist' ('out-' + (Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd-HHmmss')); Write-Host ('Using output: ' + $out); electron-builder --dir --config.directories.output=$out; Start-Process (Join-Path $out 'win-unpacked/Flashcards Anywhere.exe')"
